A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was excited to see the film. I walked out disappointed and prepared to see another Lucas Film movie. The last Jedi is full of silly plot holes. Beyond those\, In a movie where I wanted to see strong female characters\, I saw incompetent female characters and I was told to recognize how strong they were. And none of the male characters was worth a second look. Just a bad mcvie.
